1676630.name: Newfound Courage - Art Pack
1676630.description:
The complete art pack for Newfound Courage and Winter's Fair by Kurt Prieto, Mafi, and Curtis Campion. This pack contains the following:

- All versions of the Newfound Courage concept art
- Brand new introduction art soon to be added to the game
- A number of beautiful in-game screenshots from both Newfound Courage and Winter's Fair

The art will be downloaded to Newfound Courage - Art Pack folder in your Steam Directory:
[…]\Steam\steamapps\common\Newfound Courage\Newfound Courage - Art Pack
1676630.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
